name: BlipBlapBall
description:
What if sports were turn based? BlipBlapBall is the answer to that age old question. Blip and blap your way to victory by scoring more goals than those chumps on the other team. 

Made in 48 hours for Ludum Dare 41.

I'm currently working on a sports management game that could potentially use games similar to this one as the core gameplay element so any criticism, praise, suggestions, or feedback is greatly appreciated.
